ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.server.database

Class SQLiteDatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.server.database.SQLiteDatabaseManager

  • public class SQLiteDatabaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class organizes the database on the server. It directly processes the requests on the database concerning Users and the IDs of the shared lists

    Every Request that has to do with list or item updates goes to the NeodatisDatabaseManager (object database)
